#summary deleteByKey(key)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelClassFunctions Model Class Functions]

*Description*:

Finds the record with the supplied key and deletes it. Returns true on successful deletion of the row, false otherwise.

*Return Type*:

Boolean

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *key* || numeric, string or list || true || - || See documentation for `findByKey` ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset result = model("user").deleteByKey(1)>
}}}

*Related*:

 * DeletingRecords (chapter)
 * [delete delete()] (function)
 * [deleteAll deleteAll()] (function)
 * [deleteOne deleteOne()] (function)
